value.title: The Week’s 10 Biggest Funding Rounds: xAI Leads As 2026 Is Off To A Brisk Start
value.content: The first full week of 2026 brought us a whopping $20 billion new funding round for Elon Musk’s xAI. We also counted multiple other rounds of more than $100 million.

value.title: A16z Raises $15B In New Funds, Its Largest Haul To Date, Promises To Back Startups Advancing U.S. Interests
value.content: Andreessen Horowitz announced $15 billion in new funds, its largest fundraising haul to date, with the firm promising to back startups in AI, crypto and beyond that it says advance American interests.

value.title: Stablecoin Startup Rain Raises $250M Series C at $1.95B Valuation – Its Third Round In Less Than A Year
value.content: Rain, which is building infrastructure for payments with stablecoins, has raised $250 million in a Series C funding round led by Iconiq. Its post-money valuation is $1.95 billion, up 17x from last March.

value.title: Large American VCs Topped 2025 Active Investor Ranks, Including A16Z, Accel And Sequoia
value.content: The most active post-seed startup investors in the past got busier in 2025, which is not that surprising given that it was the strongest year for North American startup investment in four years.

value.title: The Startup Economy: Nothing Seems To Move, But Everything Does
value.content: Since the new millennium, $4.2 trillion has been invested into the global startup economy, producing 97,982 scaleups, per research from Mind The Bridge and Crunchbase. And yet, dive deeper and one thing becomes clear: despite the “new economy” continuing to generate industry disruptors at a steady pace, the overall picture of global innovation remains largely unchanged, writes guest author Alberto Onetti.

value.title: Exclusive: Luxury Presence Raises $22M Series C For AI-Powered Marketing Aimed At Real Estate Agents
value.content: Luxury Presence, an AI-powered marketing platform for real estate agents, has raised $22 million in a Series C round of funding led by Bessemer Venture Partners.

value.title: North American Startup Funding Soared 46% In 2025, Driven By AI Boom
value.content: Investors poured $280 billion into seed through growth-stage rounds for U.S. and Canadian companies in 2025, per Crunchbase data, the highest annual total in four years.

value.title: Global Venture Funding In 2025 Surged As Startup Deals And Valuations Set All-Time Records
value.content: After three years of declining or flat venture investment, global startup funding grew year over year in 2025 with venture and growth investors pouring $425 billion into more than 24,000 private companies, Crunchbase data shows.

value.title: Sector Snapshot: US Semiconductor Startup Funding Hits Record High
value.content: With record investment to AI companies hungry for faster, cheaper, and more energy-efficient processing power, it's no surprise that U.S. semiconductor startup funding charted record highs in 2025.
